<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Right-Hand Blood](/Feats.aspx?ID=2799) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

It's said that the flesh of the right side of a hyena can heal diseases, but that of the left side is poisonous. You can take 1 damage to feed someone blood from your right side and [Administer First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=54) or take 2d8 damage to [Treat Disease](/Actions.aspx?ID=55) or [Treat Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=57); in either case, you don't need [healer's tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=25), and gain a +1 item bonus. Blood from your left side causes the check to critically fail automatically.
name: Right-Hand Blood
